activity-description.name: linking1
activity-description.student-description: This is the description for the student

ActivityDocumentComponent.title: Goals
ActivityDocumentComponent.IntroductoryText: Construct the TrainTrack model. Use more than one pattern to make the model. Use different colours for each pattern to show other people how you made your model. Find a rule for the number of tiles for any Model Number

ActivityDocumentComponentList.ActivityDocumentComponent: Use your rule to find the number of tiles for Model Number: 6, 12, 1, 100

ActivityDocumentComponent.title: Find the number of tiles for Model Number 6
Find the number of tiles for Model Number 12
Find the number of tiles for Model Number 1
Find the number of tiles for Model Number 100

ActivityDocumentComponentList.ActivityDocumentComponent: Is your rule correct or not? In the next task, you will discuss with another student. Make some notes here to explain why your rule is correct or not to prepare for this group activity.
